trip1.name: Neelum Valley
trip1.description: Experience the breathtaking beauty of Neelum Valley, with its lush green meadows, pristine rivers, and snow-capped mountains. This tour offers a perfect blend of adventure and serenity.

trip2.name: Hunza Valley
trip2.description: Discover the majestic Hunza Valley, known for its stunning landscapes, ancient forts, and rich cultural heritage.

trip2.name: Islamabad Tour
trip2.description: Explore the beautiful capital city of Pakistan, featuring modern architecture, lush parks, and cultural landmarks.

trip3.name: Fairy Meadows
trip3.description: Visit the enchanting Fairy Meadows, offering spectacular views of Nanga Parbat and pristine alpine landscapes.
